column1: Smoque BBQ////Arriving at probably the peak time to eat (8pm)
column2: there was  a line from the counter out the door
column3: but it did move at a nice clip.  Now your first inclination is to ask
column4: "why don't they have outdoor seating?"  Well
column5: I overheard another table say that the neighbors are against it
column6: which is evident by the big signs on the side street indicating that parking along that street is for "RESIDENTS ONLY."  But there is plenty of parking on Pulaski
